# Q1: Data Source 
The dataset **MFG10YearTerminationData** has been downloaded from **https://www.kaggle.com/**

#Q2: Import file to R

```{r}
setwd("D:\\Study\\Datasets")
Terminationdata=read.csv("MFG10YearTerminationData.csv")
Terminationdata
```
#Q3 - Descriptive statistics

#Average length of service

```{r}
mean(Terminationdata$length_of_service)

```
#median of employee age
```{r}
median(Terminationdata$age)
```
#Number of female & Male employee termination
```{r}
table(sort(Terminationdata$gender_short))
```
#range of age of employees
```{r}
range(Terminationdata$age)
```


#Q3 - Transformation

```{r}
Log_con=log10(Terminationdata$length_of_service)
```


#Q4 - Graphs

**Boxplot**
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(Terminationdata, aes(x=age,y=city_name)) +geom_dotplot()
```
**Scatterplot**
```{r}
ggplot(Terminationdata, aes(y=age,x=store_name))+geom_point()
```
